course_description: Explore classic works of English literature.

This course will provide an introduction to implementing OpenAI models. Students will learn the fundamentals of working with OpenAI models and gain hands-on experience in implementing and training models using OpenAI's tools and frameworks. Topics covered include data preprocessing, model architecture design, training and fine-tuning, and evaluation of OpenAI models. By the end of the course, students will have the skills and knowledge to implement and deploy their own OpenAI models for various applications.
